# ä»ä¸Šåˆ°ä¸‹æ‰“å°äºŒå‰æ ‘ I

æç¤º

  • äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„ å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ï¼ˆBFSï¼‰ã€‚

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * class TreeNode {
 *     val: number
 *     left: TreeNode | null
 *     right: TreeNode | null
 *     constructor(val?: number, left?: TreeNode | null, right?: TreeNode | null) {
 *         this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)
 *         this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left)
 *         this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right)
 *     }
 * }
 */

function levelOrder(root: TreeNode | null): number[] {
    if(!root) return []

    let treeNode: TreeNode[] = [root]
    let results: number[] = []

    while(treeNode.length){
        let currentNode = treeNode.shift()

        results.push(currentNode.val)

        if(currentNode.left){
            treeNode.push(currentNode.left)
        }

        if(currentNode.right){
            treeNode.push(currentNode.right)
        }
    }

    return results
};

# ä»ä¸Šåˆ°ä¸‹æ‰“å°äºŒå‰æ ‘ II

æç¤º

  • æ¯å±‚æ‰“å°åˆ°ä¸€è¡Œï¼š å°†æœ¬å±‚å…¨éƒ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹æ‰“å°åˆ°ä¸€è¡Œï¼Œå¹¶å°†ä¸‹ä¸€å±‚å…¨éƒ¨èŠ‚ç‚¹åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œä»¥æ­¤ç±»æ¨ï¼Œå³å¯åˆ†ä¸ºå¤šè¡Œæ‰“å°

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * class TreeNode {
 *     val: number
 *     left: TreeNode | null
 *     right: TreeNode | null
 *     constructor(val?: number, left?: TreeNode | null, right?: TreeNode | null) {
 *         this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)
 *         this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left)
 *         this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right)
 *     }
 * }
 */
function levelOrder(root: TreeNode | null): number[][] {
    let results: number[][] = []
    let quene: TreeNode[] = [root]

    if (!root) return results

    while (quene.length) {
        let temp = []

        for (let i = quene.length; i > 0; i--) {
            let node = quene.shift()
            temp.push(node.val)

            if (node.left) quene.push(node.left)
            if (node.right) quene.push(node.right)
        }

        results.push(temp)
    }

    return results
};

# æ ‘çš„å­ç»“æ„

è¾“å…¥ä¸¤æ£µäºŒå‰æ ‘ A å’Œ Bï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­ B æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ A çš„å­ç»“æ„ã€‚(çº¦å®šç©ºæ ‘ä¸æ˜¯ä»»æ„ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‘çš„å­ç»“æ„)

B æ˜¯ A çš„å­ç»“æ„ï¼Œ å³ A ä¸­æœ‰å‡ºç°å’Œ B ç›¸åŒçš„ç»“æ„å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ã€‚

è¿”å› trueï¼Œå› ä¸º B ä¸ A çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå­æ ‘æ‹¥æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„ç»“æ„å’ŒèŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ã€‚

æç¤º

  • ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š

    • è¾“å…¥ï¼šA = [1,2,3], B = [3,1]
    • è¾“å‡ºï¼šfalse

  • ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼š

    • è¾“å…¥ï¼šA = [3,4,5,1,2], B = [4,1]
    • è¾“å‡ºï¼štrue
/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * class TreeNode {
 *     val: number
 *     left: TreeNode | null
 *     right: TreeNode | null
 *     constructor(val?: number, left?: TreeNode | null, right?: TreeNode | null) {
 *         this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)
 *         this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left)
 *         this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right)
 *     }
 * }
 */

function isSubStructure(A: TreeNode | null, B: TreeNode | null): boolean {
    return (A !== null && B !== null) && (walkTree(A, B) || isSubStructure(A.left, B) || isSubStructure(A.right, B))
};

function walkTree(A: TreeNode | null, B: TreeNode | null): boolean {
    if(B === null) return true

    if(A === null || A.val !== B.val) return false

    return walkTree(A.left, B.left) && walkTree(A.right, B.right)
}

# äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„é•œåƒ

ğŸ‘‰ Leetcode é“¾æ¥åœ¨æ–°çª—å£æ‰“å¼€

è¯·å®Œæˆä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œè¾“å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼Œè¯¥å‡½æ•°è¾“å‡ºå®ƒçš„é•œåƒã€‚

ç”¨ä¾‹

é¢˜ç›®åˆ†æ

é•œåƒæƒ…å†µ

  • å·¦å­æ ‘å’Œå³å­æ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹äº¤æ¢

è¿”å›æ¡ä»¶

  • å­æ ‘åˆ°è¾¾å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œroot ä¸ºç©ºæ—¶
/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * class TreeNode {
 *     val: number
 *     left: TreeNode | null
 *     right: TreeNode | null
 *     constructor(val?: number, left?: TreeNode | null, right?: TreeNode | null) {
 *         this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)
 *         this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left)
 *         this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right)
 *     }
 * }
 */

function mirrorTree(root: TreeNode | null): TreeNode | null {
    if(root === null) return null

    const left = mirrorTree(root.left), right = mirrorTree(root.right)

    root.left = right
    root.right = left

    return root
};

è¿”å›æ¡ä»¶

  • å·¦å³å­æ ‘éƒ½åŒæ—¶åˆ°è¾¾å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿”å› true
  • å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ºç©ºå¦ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ä¸ºç©ºæˆ–èŠ‚ç‚¹å–å€¼ä¸ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œè¿”å› false
/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * class TreeNode {
 *     val: number
 *     left: TreeNode | null
 *     right: TreeNode | null
 *     constructor(val?: number, left?: TreeNode | null, right?: TreeNode | null) {
 *         this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)
 *         this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left)
 *         this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right)
 *     }
 * }
 */

function isSymmetric(root: TreeNode | null): boolean {
    if(root === null) return true

    let left = root.left, right = root.right

    return swap(left, right)
};

function swap(left: TreeNode, right: TreeNode) {
    if(left === null && right === null) return true
    if(left === null || right === null || left.val !== right.val) return false

    return swap(left.left, right.right) && swap(left.right, right.left)
}
